item.title: ITUB
item.description: score:76 Chances: Itaú Unibanco Holding S.A. (NYSE: ITUB) has announced a dividend of $0.23 per share, payable on 2024-03-15 Increased operating revenues and managerial financial margin are partially offset by escalating costs for Itau Unibanco (ITUB) in fourth-quarter 2023 ITUB is one of the largest privately held banks in Brazil with significant operations in several South American countries Risks: Itaú Unibanco Holding S.
